sections.heading: fair board; compliance with Open Meetings Act and Records Management Act
sections.text: County fair boards established under sections 2-221 to 2-231 shall comply with the Open Meetings Act and the Records Management Act.SourceLaws 1992, LB 398, ยง 1;Laws 1997, LB 469, ยง 28;Laws 1999, LB 437, ยง 16;Laws 2004, LB 821,
